eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Clark, WA; Clackamas; Columbia; Multnomah; Washington, OR; at 01:31 PM ON JAN 6, 2026 Effective until 03:31 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the Emergency Alert System issued by Clark Regional Emergency Services Agency.
